alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Cherokee; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued September 23 at 8:35PM CDT until September 24 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 693 REMAINS VALID UNTIL MIDNIGHT CDT TONIGHT FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN KANSAS THIS WATCH INCLUDES 3 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST KANSAS BOURBON CHEROKEE CRAWFORD IN MISSOURI THIS WATCH INCLUDES 17 COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MISSOURI BENTON CAMDEN HICKORY MORGAN IN SOUTHWEST MISSOURI BARRY BARTON CEDAR DADE DALLAS GREENE JASPER LAWRENCE MCDONALD NEWTON POLK IN WEST CENTRAL MISSOURI ST. CLAIR VERNON THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ANDERSON, APPLETON CITY, ARNICA, AURORA, BAXTER SPRINGS, BOLIVAR, BUFFALO, CAMDENTON, CAPLINGER MILLS, CARTHAGE, CASSVILLE, CEDAR SPRINGS, CHARITY, CHICOPEE, COLE CAMP, COLUMBUS, CROCKERVILLE, CROSS TIMBERS, DECATURVILLE, EDMONSON, EL DORADO SPRINGS, FILLEY, FOOSE, FORT SCOTT, GOODMAN, GREENFIELD, HERMITAGE, JOHNSON CITY, JOPLIN, KENOMA, LAMAR, LAURIE, LINCOLN, LOCKWOOD, LONE OAK, LOWELL, MADRY, MARCH, MARIONVILLE, MEINERT, MONETT, MORA, MOUNT VERNON, NEOSHO, NEUTRAL, NEVADA, NOEL, OLIVE, OSAGE BEACH, PAWNEE STATION, PINEVILLE, PITTSBURG, PITTSBURG, PLAD, QUINCY, RIVERTON, ROACH, ROCKY COMFORT, ROCKY MOUNT, SHERWIN, SOUTH WEST CITY, SPRINGFIELD, STIPPVILLE, STOCKTON, STOVER, TIFFIN, VERSAILLES, VILLAGE OF FOUR SEASONS, WARSAW, WEAUBLEAU, WHEATLAND, WHITAKERVILLE, AND WINDYVILLE.
